mimxrt1060_evkb.customDocMD: The EVKB version of this board does not have its own documentation in the Zephyr tree, but it is closely related to the [mimxrt1060_evk](https://docs.zephyrproject.org/3.6.0/boards/arm/mimxrt1060_evk/doc/index.html).

nrf52840dk_nrf52840.customDocMD:
We use the nRF5240 Development Kit along with an ESP32 board running [AT modem firmware](https://www.espressif.com/en/support/download/at) to provide connectivity. The pinout for connecting these boards is described in the README.md of each [Golioth Firmware SDK sample application](https://github.com/golioth/golioth-firmware-sdk/tree/main/examples/zephyr).

[nRF52840-DK-NRF52840 (nrf52840dk_nrf52840)](https://docs.zephyrproject.org/3.6.0/boards/arm/nrf52840dk_nrf52840/doc/index.html)
